About

Attentive - Executive - Easily Trained

I highly motivated junior FrontEnd Developer. Freelancer. I like to create websites, and I`m looking forward to connecting my life with it. Primary obligations: Contact the client, and discuss all terms, requirements, and responsibilities.Identification of all customer needs and requirements. I am making suggestions and corrections from me as a specialist. Completion of the project and subsequent transfer of all materials to the customer. I have done several projects on freelance for customers, from simple landing pages to multi-page sites, and the customers were satisfied.

I am ready to start working as a Junior Frontend Developer.

Skills
  • Java Script (basic), jQuery(basic), HTML5, CSS, SCSS, SASS, BOOTSTRAP, Git, GitHub
  • Adobe Photoshop, Figma, Zeplin
  • Cross Browser & Device Compatibility, Responsive Design

MixProtein

Development of adaptive and cross‑browser landing site for the companyʼs product. Order from a regular customer. The design of the mobile version was fully developed, which helped to save money for the customer and not pay for the additional creation of the mobile version from the designer. The whole site is made based on Swiper. As a result, the client is ready to cooperate further.

Main features: Fully responsive design, spoilers, hover effects, animation, Improvement of some points from the side of the user.
